                    OSS through Java - Trouble Ticket API
                                RI Change History
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Previous Version      :1.0.2
Release Date          :2005/10
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Fixed Bugs:
>Bug ID: 6272267 Invalid schema encoding/decoding from to RI and TCK 
> <http://bugs.sun.com/bugdatabase/view_bug.do?bug_id=6272267>*

> encoding/decoding from to RI and TCK, State: In progress, bug,
> Reported:
> 18-MAY-2005, Reported against:

> 18-MAY-2005
